. // R. T. Bell , Coll. / BISHOP MUSEUM ( 1 ♂ , BPBM )
.

Remarks . Colouration: Extent of dorsal, dark markings on vertex may vary within certain limits. Membrane semi-hyaline, infuscate with hyaline longitudinal band. Structure: Eye-ocellus distance to distance of ocelli: 1: 0.89. Pretarsus of hind leg nearly 1.4x as long as meso- and metatarsus together. Ratio of rear tarsal segment: 1: 0.33: 0.4.
Distribution . According to the newly acquired collection data, the species is distributed from Western New Guinea to New Britain ( Fig. 4 ).
